titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the month of November 2022 as "National XR Month".
Expressing support for the designation of the month of November 2022 as "National XR Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National XR Month. XR is an umbrella term for augmented reality and other immersive technologies that integrate digital content with physical environments.
